name: Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who is the main character of the series?
questions.explanation:
Kamille Bidan.

	Kamille is a Newtype just like Amuro and Char, who operates under the alias of Quattro Bajeena. He resents his feminine-sounding name and is instantly recognizable for his blue hair.

questions.text: Who normally pilots the Hyaku Shiki?
questions.explanation:
Quattro Bajeena.

	The Hyaku Shiki, unlike Char's other mobile suits, is golden. Quattro acts as a mentor to Kamille and turns him into an ace mobile suit pilot.

questions.text: Quattro Bajeena is really Char Aznable.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Char is the most recognizeable characters in the Gundam universe. He normally wears red clothing, pilots red mobile suits, and wears elaborate masks or sunglasses to hide his identity.

Jerid Messa.

	Jerid is a mobile suit pilot for the Titans, the tyrannical group who has taken over the Earth Federation in the name of preserving peace. Kamille Bidan, Quattro Bajeena and Amuro Ray are members of the rebel group Anti-Earth Union Group (A.E.U.G.)

questions.text: The A.E.U.G. isn't the only group resisting the Titans. Who leads the Karaba, a similar rebel group?
questions.explanation:
Hayato Kobayashi.

	Hayato was Amuro's friendly rival in the original series, and is married to Fraw Bow in this series. He dies in the series "Mobile Suit Gundam Double Zeta".

questions.text: Who is Kamille's love interest for much of the series?
questions.explanation:
Four Murasame.

	Four is an artifical Newtype whose powers and personality are unstable. She pilots the Psyco Gundam, a mobile suit made just for Newtypes. She dies in battle with Jerid Messa.

Paptimus Scirocco.

	Paptimus is an Italian mobile suit developer who is also a powerful Newtype. He attempts to enslave both Earthnoids and Spacenoids, but is killed by Kamille Bidan.

questions.text: Who tells Kamille that the Zeta Gundam can use people's will as energy?
questions.explanation:
Emma Sheen.

	Emma is a sister-figure to the angry young Kamille, and pilots the Gundam Mk. II after Kamille recieves the Zeta Gundam halfway through the series.

questions.text: Which one of these characters survives through the series?
questions.explanation:
Fa Yuiry.

	Fa becomes Kamille's partner and lover after the show, and the two show up in "Mobile Suit Gundam Double Zeta". Kamille is left witless after Scirocco's final attack, and Fa takes care of him.

Reccoa Londe.

	Reccoa originally begins as an AEUG officer, but soon becomes disenchanted and joins the Titans due to the charisma of Paptimus Scirocco. She is killed in battle by Emma Sheen.
